text.div:
MedicationRequestSubjectfamilySearchParameter

Parameter subject.family:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: MedicationRequestSubjectfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
